column5: DESCRIPTION

Counts demand and DCU prefetch RFOs
Counts demand and DCU prefetch instruction cacheline

Counts RFO requests generated by L2 prefetchers
Counts code reads generated by L2 prefetchers

Countsof demand RFO requests to write to partial cache lines
Counts UC instruction fetch

Counts DCU hardware prefetcher data read
Counts any request
Counts streaming store
Counts any data read (demand & prefetch)
Counts any rfo reads (demand & prefetch)
Counts any code reads (demand & prefetch)
Counts any data/code/rfo reads (demand & prefetch)
Counts any prefetch read
have any response type
miss L2 with no details on snoop-related information
miss L2 with a snoop miss response
miss L2 and the snoops to sibling cores hit in either E/S state and the line is not forwarded
hit in the other module where modified copies were found in other core's L1 cache
